reference.title: javaExceptionClassRef
reference.shortdesc: This element provides a Java exception class topic type as a link in a DITA map.

section.title: Description
section.p: A <javaExceptionClassRef > can contain <topicref> and <topicmeta> elements, allowing you to express navigation or table-of-contents hierarchies, as well as implying relationships between the containing topicref and its children.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <javaPackageRef navtitle="Package com.ibm.xtools.pluglets" id="com.ibm.xtools.patterns.pluglet" href="com.ibm.xtools.pluglets.dita" locktitle="yes"> <javaClassRef navtitle="PlugletCompiler Class" href="PlugletCompiler.dita"> </javaClassRef> <javaExceptionClassRef navtitle="PlugletException Class" href="PlugletException.dita"> </javaExceptionClassRef> </javaPackageRef>
